        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading strategies:Understanding Titles.Part1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert strategies:Understanding Titles.Part1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lecture strategies:arrangement Titles.Part1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Leitura strategies:Understanding Titles.Part1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lettura strategies:Understanding Titles.Part1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τίτλοι Part1 ανάγνωσης strategies:Understanding</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lectura strategies:Understanding Titles.Part1</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a worksheet which requires the student to paraprase Titles of movies and translate them into hebrew.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">paraphrasing</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">titles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">translation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Bogen, der den Kursteilnehmer zu 
den paraprase Titeln Filmen benötigt und übersetzt sie in Hebräer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un tableau qui exige l'étudiant aux titres
de paraprase des films et les traduit en hébreu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha que requeira o estudante aos 
títulos do paraprase dos filmes e tradu-los no hebrew.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio di lavoro che richiede 
l'allievo ai titoli di paraprase dei film e li traduce in 
ebreo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας που απαιτεί το 
σπουδαστή στους τίτλους paraprase των κινηματογράφων και τους 
μεταφράζει στα εβραϊκά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ésta es una hoja de trabajo que requiere a 
estudiante a los títulos del paraprase de películas y las traduce a 
hebreo.</string>
          </description>
